programmes.show_description: The Secret Cellar. When landlords Harry and Jason open the door to a secret cellar in The Swan Hotel, they unleash a negative entity that delights in taunting the couple. S5, Ep4
The Witches Of Leigh. In their most horrifying investigation yet, Ian performs exorcism to save a family in Essex. Jayne calls on the spirits of witches to help save them. S5, Ep5
Teleshopping.
Drew hits the road with upholsterer, Craig. In Derbyshire a 15th century house has some Victorian dining chairs with potential, and they visit an antique centre in Lincolnshire. S14, Ep10
Drew scours a Surrey sculpture park, where a pair of rare 18th century church lych-gates catches his eye. And in London, he visits a small showroom with big character. S14, Ep11

Drew is in Monmouthshire at the UK's largest stockist of antique railwayana, where he spots some amazing wagon signage. In Gloucestershire he finds a stunning Victorian card table. S14, Ep15
Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw are shopping in Cumbria for the second day of their road trip. They find amazing antiques before they head to auction in Harrogate. S14, Ep12
Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw head to York to hunt for antique treasures. He tries to build on his earlier success, and she is just trying to stay in the game. S14, Ep13
Paper conservator Louise freshens up a treasured pastel portrait from 1993. Meanwhile, Steve is challenged with fixing up a very precious tin plate rocket. S6, Ep5
Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen & Crissy Rock. Comedian and actor Crissy gets a surprise at auction. Angus has a laugh at Laurence's mansion, where he finds a big porcelain pumpkin. S3, Ep2

The Man Behind The Curtain. Since age three, a protective spirit has watched over Noah in his bedroom. But since moving in with his girlfriend, the spirit has turned sinister. S5, Ep7
Heartbreak House. An oppressive force has tormented Sonia and Baz since they extended their house. On the verge of splitting up, they desperately need help. S5, Ep8
Bad Luck Bungalow. Jacqueline and Dan are living in fear after years of frightening paranormal activity. The team spend the night at the bungalow to uncover the truth. S5, Ep9
